price: Do you not see that We sent devils against the disbelievers constantly inciting them to sin?
arabic: أَلَمۡ تَرَ أَنَّآ أَرۡسَلۡنَا ٱلشَّيَٰطِينَ عَلَى ٱلۡكَٰفِرِينَ تَؤُزُّهُمۡ أَزّٗا

version.title: English Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Englsih by Rowwad Translation Center in cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: alam tara annā arsalnā al-shayāṭīna ʿalā al-kāfirīna ta-uzzuhum azzan
